name: Turn off "Multiple SQL statements for each measure"
description: List universes using the "Multiple SQL statements for each measure" option.
output: List universes using the "Multiple SQL statements for each measure" option.
rationale: Multiple SQL statements for each measure can negatively impact performance, although you may choose to enable this option during development since it may solve some fan trap situations.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
